thread.title: ‘Beasts of No Nation’ tests same-day Netflix, theater release
thread.title_full: ‘Beasts of No Nation’ tests same-day Netflix, theater release - San Francisco Chronicle

author: Michael Ordoña
title: ‘Beasts of No Nation’ tests same-day Netflix, theater release
text:
Photo: Netflix, McClatchy-Tribune News Service Idris Elba and Abraham Attah in the Netflix original film “Beasts of No Nation.” Idris Elba and Abraham Attah in the Netflix original film “Beasts...
In “day-and-date” releasing, a film becomes available via streaming or video-on-demand the same day it’s first out in theaters. Cary Fukunaga’s “Beasts of No Nation” may be set to make the biggest splash yet in the day-and-date waters when it debuts in theaters and Netflix on Friday, Oct. 16. Idris Elba and Abraham Attah in the Netflix original film “Beasts of No Nation.” Idris Elba and Abraham Attah in the Netflix original film “Beasts...
In “day-and-date” releasing, a film becomes available via streaming or video-on-demand the same day it’s first out in theaters. Cary Fukunaga’s “Beasts of No Nation” may be set to make the biggest splash yet in the day-and-date waters when it debuts in theaters and Netflix on Friday, Oct. 16.
